title: Caterpillar partners with NVIDIA to lay the foundation for autonomous systems
description:
Caterpillar plans to make upgrades with NVIDIA to ensure that its assets are ready for AI-assisted and potentially autonomous operations.

The post Caterpillar partners with NVIDIA to lay the foundation for autonomous systems appeared first on The Robot Report.
